title: How to Make Treacle Pudding

steps.headline: Cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Fold in the flour and soda and mix until smooth.
Pour in the syrup first, then the batter; smooth the top.
Bake for about 25 to 30 minutes, until golden.
Remove from oven and let it cool for five minutes.
Get your serving plate ready, and place it on top of pudding.
Quickly turn from Bundt pan onto platter.
steps.description: If it sticks, loosen sides with a rubber spatula (this way you don’t hurt your Bundt pan, if it is non-stick).

steps.headline: Serve this by itself, or with hot custard.

text: Cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.  Add eggs, one at a time.  Add the vanilla.  Fold in the flour and soda and mix until smooth. Set oven at 350 degrees. Grease your 10-inch Bundt pan.  Pour in the syrup first, then the batter; smooth the top.  Bake for about 25 to 30 minutes, until golden.  Remove from oven and let it cool for five minutes.  Get your serving plate ready, and place it on top of pudding.  Quickly turn from Bundt pan onto platter. If it sticks, loosen sides with a rubber spatula (this way you don’t hurt your Bundt pan, if it is non-stick). Serve this by itself, or with hot custard. Enjoy!! ! Finished.
